text.17_Chapter, 5_Verse, 1_Comment: Really, like the clay is in the potters hands to do with it as he wants, you are in my (Hashem's) hands.
text.17_Chapter, 5_Verse, 0_Comment: Can I (Hashem) not do with you (Jews) like the potter does with the clay? He makes from it a different vessel after he has destroyed the first.
